response.overview: Expecting to much a beautiful and close to nature time off, a group of software engineers choose a place 'Vilupura' to spent their long time off. Life is all about expecting the unexpected. Such unexpected events dragged their planned beautiful vacation in a chase for their life situations. Who... what... why... knowing this will take us to through an amazing thrilling experience and at the same time raising a thought provoking statement on vintage customs and superstitious believes..
response.title: LOCKET
